sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-menu bottom left>
    <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
      <v-btn color="primary" icon v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">
        <v-icon>mdi-dots-vertical</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </template>

    <v-list>
      <v-list-item
        v-for="(item, index) in items"
        :key="index"
        @click="handleClick(index)"
      >
        <v-list-item-icon>
          <v-icon v-text="item.icon"></v-icon>
        </v-list-item-icon>
        <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
      </v-list-item>
    </v-list>
  </v-menu>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    items: [
      {
        title: "Edit",
        icon: "mdi-pencil",
        click() {
          console.log("edit");
        },
      },
      {
        title: "Due Date",
        icon: "mdi-calendar",
        click() {
          console.log("due date");
        },
      },
      {
        title: "Delete",
        icon: "mdi-delete",
        click() {
          console.log("delete");
        },
      },
    ],
  }),
};
</script>

<style></style>
